description: Returns information about an DataSync agent, such as its name, service endpoint type, and status.

parameters.name: AgentArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync agent that you want information about.

nested_items.description: If the status is ONLINE, the agent is configured properly and ready to use.
If the status is OFFLINE, the agent has been out of contact with DataSync for five minutes or longer. This can happen for a few reasons. For more information, see What do I do if my agent is offline?

nested_items.name: LastConnectionTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the agent was communicating with the DataSync service.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the agent was activated.

nested_items.name: EndpointType
nested_items.description: The type of service endpoint that your agent is connected to.

nested_items.name: PrivateLinkConfig
nested_items.description: The network configuration that the agent uses when connecting to a VPC service endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: Specifies the ID of the VPC endpoint that your agent connects to.

nested_items.name: PrivateLinkEndpoint
nested_items.description: Specifies the VPC endpoint provided by Amazon Web Services PrivateLink that your agent connects to.

nested_items.name: SubnetArns
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the subnet where your VPC endpoint is located. You can only specify one ARN.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupArns
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the security group that provides DataSync access to your VPC endpoint. You can only specify one ARN.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the DataSync agent.
